context_of_use: This use case allows customers to view the delivery status and tracking information for their orders within the e-commerce system.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: To know the delivery status of their orders.
description: This use case enables customers to track their orders and view delivery status information.
triggering_event: Customer requests to track their orders.
preconditions: Customer must be logged into their account.
Customer must have placed at least one order.
postconditions: Customer successfully views the delivery status and tracking information for their orders.
assumptions: The customer has a valid account and has previously placed orders.
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to track their orders.
The system shall provide delivery status information.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the specific tracking information to be displayed.
main_flow: 1. Customer requests to track orders → System verifies customer authentication.
2. System retrieves order tracking information → System displays delivery status and tracking details to the customer.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 1): If the customer is not authenticated, the system prompts the customer to log in.
